Title: Character.AI is banning minors from AI character chats

Title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella says Bill Gates warned him that investing in OpenAI would be like setting $1 billion on fire
Description:
Microsoft made its first investment in Sam Altman's OpenAI in 2019.
It now holds a 27% in OpenAI's for-profit business.

Title: Hurricane Melissa leaves Jamaica devastated. And, the shutdown's impact on airports
Description:
Officials are assessing the damage after Hurricane Melissa made landfall in Jamaica as a Category 5.

Title: Blue Jays even World Series with 6-2 win over Dodgers in Game 4
Description:
The Toronto Blue Jays shook off their epic 18-inning loss to even the World Series in Game 4.
Ohtani redefined the concept of short rest by taking the mound just more than 17 hours after Game 3.

Title: A Sequoia partner warns the AI gold rush is built on shaky, 'experimental' revenue

Title: Female founders say sexual harassment is still common while seeking VC funding
Description:
A venture capitalist surveyed female founders about their experiences.
She didn't ask about sexual harassment, but respondents told her anyway.
